83 inline bool CComponentBase::IsComponentActive() const
84 {
85  return (m_contextPtr != NULL);
86 }

100 #define I_BEGIN_COMPONENT(ComponentType)\
101  typedef ComponentType CurrentComponentType;\
102  static const icomp::IRealComponentStaticInfo& InitStaticInfo(ComponentType* componentPtr)\
103  {\
104  static icomp::TComponentStaticInfo<ComponentType> staticInfo(&BaseClass::InitStaticInfo(NULL));\
105  static bool isStaticInitialized = false;\
106  if (isStaticInitialized && (componentPtr == NULL)){\
107  return staticInfo;\
108  }\
109  isStaticInitialized = true;\
110  BaseClass::InitStaticInfo(componentPtr);
111 
118 #define I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(ComponentType)\
119  typedef ComponentType CurrentComponentType;\
120  static const icomp::IRealComponentStaticInfo& InitStaticInfo(ComponentType* componentPtr)\
121  {\
122  static icomp::CBaseComponentStaticInfo staticInfo(&BaseClass::InitStaticInfo(NULL));\
123  static bool isStaticInitialized = false;\
124  if (isStaticInitialized && (componentPtr == NULL)){\
125  return staticInfo;\
126  }\
127  isStaticInitialized = true;\
128  BaseClass::InitStaticInfo(componentPtr);
129 
137 #define I_END_COMPONENT\
138  return staticInfo;\
139  }\
140  virtual const icomp::IRealComponentStaticInfo& GetComponentStaticInfo() const\
141  {\
142  return InitStaticInfo(NULL);\
143  }
144 
151 #define I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(InterfaceType)\
152  {\
153  static icomp::TInterfaceRegistrator<InterfaceType> staticRegistrator(staticInfo);\
154  Q_UNUSED(staticRegistrator);\
155  }
156 
160 #define I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT(ElementName)\
161  static icomp::TSubelementStaticInfo<CurrentComponentType> subelementInfo_##ElementName(#ElementName, staticInfo);
162 
169 #define I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT_INTERFACE(ElementName, InterfaceType, extractorFunction)\
170  {\
171  static icomp::TSubelementStaticInfo<CurrentComponentType>::Registrator<InterfaceType> staticRegistrator(\
172  subelementInfo_##ElementName,\
173  extractorFunction);\
174  Q_UNUSED(staticRegistrator);\
175  }

183 #define I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT_INTERFACE_T(ElementName, InterfaceType, extractorFunction)\
184  {\
185  static icomp::TSubelementStaticInfo<CurrentComponentType>::Registrator<InterfaceType> staticRegistrator(\
186  subelementInfo_##ElementName,\
187  extractorFunction<InterfaceType>);\

300  static icomp::TAttributeStaticInfo<member##_AttrType> member##_Info(staticInfo, id, description, &member##_Default, isObligatory? member##_AttrType::DAF_OBLIGATORY: member##_AttrType::DAF_OPTIONAL, istd::CClassInfo::GetInfo<member##_Type::InterfaceType>());\

445 template <class Dest>
446 Dest* CompCastPtr(istd::IPolymorphic* objectPtr)
447 {
448  const icomp::IComponent* componentPtr = dynamic_cast<const icomp::IComponent*>(objectPtr);
449  if (componentPtr != NULL){
450  icomp::ICompositeComponent* parentComponentPtr = const_cast<icomp::ICompositeComponent*>(componentPtr->GetParentComponent(true));
451 
452  if (parentComponentPtr != NULL){
453  Dest* retVal = (Dest*)parentComponentPtr->GetInterface(istd::CClassInfo(typeid(Dest)));
454 
455  if (retVal != NULL){
456  return retVal;
457  }
458  }
459  }
460 
461  return dynamic_cast<Dest*>(objectPtr);
462 }
463 
464 
470 template <class Dest>
471 const Dest* CompCastPtr(const istd::IPolymorphic* objectPtr)
472 {
473  const icomp::IComponent* componentPtr = dynamic_cast<const icomp::IComponent*>(objectPtr);
474  if (componentPtr != NULL){
475  icomp::ICompositeComponent* parentComponentPtr = const_cast<icomp::ICompositeComponent*>(componentPtr->GetParentComponent(true));
476 
477  if (parentComponentPtr != NULL){
478  const Dest* retVal = (const Dest*)parentComponentPtr->GetInterface(istd::CClassInfo(typeid(Dest)));
479 
480  if (retVal != NULL){
481  return retVal;
482  }
483  }
484  }
485 
486  return dynamic_cast<const Dest*>(objectPtr);
487 }
